meanings.definition: One of a number of alternative forms of a gene.
meanings.sent1: In genetics, allelomorphs determine our inherited traits.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study allelomorphs to understand genetic diversity.
meanings.sent3: The allelomorphs at play in the gene pool make for a fascinating study.
meanings.sent4: The allelomorphs of genes dance together in a complex genetic tango.
meanings.sent5: The concept of allelomorphs helps explain the variety of traits in a population.

meanings.definition: Different versions of a gene that can occupy a particular locus.
meanings.sent1: Each parent contributes allelomorphs that combine to form the offspring's genes.
meanings.sent2: Allelomorphs can determine whether an individual has blue or brown eyes.
meanings.sent3: The allelomorphs in the gene pool decided to throw a party at the eye color locus.
meanings.sent4: The allelomorphs of genes play a game of musical chairs at the genetic locus.
meanings.sent5: The allelomorphs compete for dominance at the genetic locus, shaping our physical traits.
